description:
Kenzou was the son of Kabuto Juuzou, the inventor of Mazinger Z, but working in secret he improved upon the original designs to create the more formidable Great Mazinger. After a laboratory experiment that went wrong, he and his wife are thought to be dead. However, he was instead turned into a cyborg by his father in order to keep him alive. To shield them from danger and psychological shock, Kenzou`s sons Kouji and Shirou are unaware of this and grow believing both of their parents are dead, and were raised by Juuzou.
Kenzou reveals the truth to both of them in the Great Mazinger series, first to Shirou, since Kouji was away for a big part of the series, and their relationship would cause conflict with his adopted son Tsurugi Tetsuya, who was raised by Kenzou together with his best friend Jun and comes to feel intensely jealous of Kenzou`s actual children, especially so of Kouji. Dr. Kabuto would eventually die in battle at the end of the series and Tetsuya and Koji fight together to avenge his death.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Kabuto Kenzou
